overview: Florencia (30) is a single woman obsessed with Gustav (45), a married man of whom she was a lover. Disgusted, after he ends his relationship with her, Florencia does her best to forget Gustav by immersing herself in bars and alcohol. However, she does not realize that in this journey of self-destruction, she is attracting the attention of another man, Martin (35) who carries a dark and deadly secret.
title: Eros Thanatos
